column3: Ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin nye w'egyanom fi a wɔka wo ho no nsoa ahotseweebea no ho emumuyɛ: na ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin a wɔka wo ho no nsoa hom asɔfodzi ho emumuyɛ."
Levi ebusuakuw no
column5: fa hɔn ka woho bra ho
column6: ma wɔmboa wo wɔ ɔsom no mu: mbom ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin a wɔka wo ho no nsom wɔ dasebuw no enyim."

column3: nye Buw no nyinara ahwɛdodze no: ahotseweebea ndzɛmba ho nye afɔrmbukyia no ho nko ara na mma wɔmmba
na wɔnhwɛ ehyiadzibuw no n'ahwɛdodze
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Buw no no ho edwuma nyinara tse: na mma ɔhɔho bi mmba hom nkyɛn."

column3: nye afɔrmbukyia no ahwɛdodze no: amma ebufuhyew bi aammba Israelmba do bio."
hwɛ
column4: mafa wo nuanom Levifo no mefi Israelmba no mu: mama hom dɛ wɔyɛ akyɛdze a wɔdze ama EWURADZE
column5: dɛ wɔnyɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho edwuma."

column2: "Na ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin a wɔka wo ho no nhwɛ hom asɔfodzi no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no n'adze biara mu
column3: na ntwamutam no mu dze no mu; na hom mfa nsom: medze asɔfodzi no mema hom dɛ akyɛdze dwuma: na ɔhɔho a ɔba ho no wonku no."
Hwɛ
column5: medze me mado afɔr ahwɛdodze ama wo
column7: medze ama ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin no osian ngosera no ntsi

column2: "Iyi na ɔnyɛ wodze wɔ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn a wɔdze esie efi ogya no mu no mu: hɔn ayɛyɛdze biara
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn edziban afɔr biara
column4: nye hɔn bɔn ho afɔr biara
column5: nye hɔn asodzi ho afɔr biara a wɔdze brɛ me no
column6: ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn mma ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin no."

column2: "Dzi no wɔ bea a hɔ yɛ krɔnkrɔn: ɔbanyin biara ndzi bi; ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn mma wo."
"Na iyi nyɛ wodze; hɔn ayɛyɛdze mu ɔmado afɔr
column3: mekyerɛ Israelmba hɔn ohim afɔr nyinara; medze ama ɔwo
column5: nye wo mbabaa a wɔka wo ho
column6: dɛ daa ahyɛdze: obiara a no ho tsew wɔ wo fi mu no ndzi bi."

column3: nye wenyin nye eburow mu papa nyinara no mu nduadzewakan a wɔdze ma EWURADZE no

column2: "Hɔn asaase do nduadzewa nyinara mu edziban beree a wɔdze brɛ EWURADZE no
column3: ɔnyɛ wodze; obiara a no ho tsew wɔ wo fi mu no ndzi bi."

column2: "Israel mu adze biara a woehyira do ama nyɛ wodze."

column3: wɔ honam a wɔdze brɛ EWURADZE no nyinara mu
column5: nyɛ wodze: naaso ɔpon na pon nyimpa mbakan
column6: nye abowa a hɔn ho nntsew mbakan so pon hɔn."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔrobɔpon hɔn a woedzi bosoom no
column3: pon hɔn
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona a ɔnoara nye  gera   eduonu."

column3: anaa apɔnkye abakan dze
column4: mma mmpon; wɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn: fa hɔn bɔgyaa no petse afɔrmbukyia no do
column5: na hyew hɔn seradze yɛ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ ohim nyan nye aserɛ nyimfa no yɛ wodze no."

column2: "Ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn mu ɔmado afɔr nyinara a Israelmba dze brɛ EWURADZE no
column3: medze mama ɔwo
column5: nye wo mbabaa a wɔka wo ho no
column6: dɛ daa ahyɛdze: ɔyɛ EWURADZE enyim daa nkyen ahyɛmu dze ma ɔwo nye w'asefo a wɔka wo ho no."

column3: Mma nnya egyapadze wɔ hɔn asaase mu
column4: nkyii so mma nnya kyɛfa bi wɔ hɔn mu: emi nye wo kyɛfa nye w'egyapadze wɔ Israelmba mu."

column3: hwɛ
column4: medze Israel mu ebupɛn du du nyinara ama hɔn dɛ egyapadze
column5: ahyɛ hɔn som a wɔsom no ananmu
column6: mekyerɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho ɔsom no a."

column2: "Na ɔdzekɔr yi mma Israelmba no mmba ehyiadzibuw no ho
column3: bɛyɛ na wɔasoa bɔn

column2: "Na Levifo no dze wɔnyɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho ɔsom edwuma
column3: na wɔnsoa no ho mbusu: ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu
column4: na Israelmba mu dze worinnya egyapadze."

column2: "Na Israelmba ebupɛn du du a wɔdze ma dɛ ɔmado afɔr ma EWURADZE no
column3: medze ama Levifo no dɛ egyapadze: dɛm ntsi na mase hɔn dɛ
column4: Israelmba mu dze worinnya egyapadze no."

column6: Sɛ hom regyegye Israelmba no hɔ ebupɛn du du no a medze fi hɔn hɔ ama hom dɛ hom egyapadze no a
column7: ɔno hom mfa no mu ebupɛn du du mu ebupɛn du nyɛ no ɔmado afɔr mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na wombu hom ɔmado afɔr mma hom dɛ ewuporoweebea eburow
column3: nye wenyintwer mayɛ."

column2: "Dɛm na hom so mbɔ ɔmado afɔr mma EWURADZE wɔ hom ebupɛn du du a
column3: hom gyegye no wɔ Israelmba hɔ nyinara mu; na hom mfa no mu EWURADZE ɔmado afɔr no mma ɔsɔfo Aaron."

column2: "Hom akyɛdze nyinara mu na hom mfa mu EWURADZE ɔmado afɔr biara mbra
column3: no mu papa nyinara
Sɛ hom rema no mu papa no do a
column4: ɔno wombu mma Levifo no dɛ ewuporoweebea ndɔree

column3: hom nye hom efifo: na ɔyɛ hom akatua a ɔhyɛ hom ehyiadzibuw ho ɔsom edwuma ananmu."

column2: "Na sɛ hom ma no mu papa no do a
column3: hom ronnsoa bɔn bi wɔ ne ntsi: na mma hom nnhura Israelmba adzekrɔnkrɔn ho
